name: Tanner Wash
description:
Introduction

Approach

Descent

There are two anchors at the 60 foot dryfall in the Coconino. One is a piton and a small rock chock. The other is easy to miss and is a single bolt right at the lip of the drop.

There is another drop in the Hermit Shale not far below the rappel. This can be bypassed on the right, but is rather loose and hazardous. Rappelling the drop is safer.

Exit

Red tape
